msg: fix up destination statistics for recovered transactions, pending adds are not visible, but pending acks are still accounted for in the messages count, commit/rollback updates enqueues/dequeues/messages as expected - https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3872, https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3305 - both kahadb and jdbc suffered
